item.title: Gadwal Gears Up for Massive Participation in BRS 25th Anniversary 'Gulabi Festival' at Warangal
item.description:
<![CDATA[In view of the upcoming "Gulabi Festival" celebrating 25 years of the Bharat Rashtra Samithi (BRS), a massive call for participation has been given by senior party leaders from Gadwal district. The event, set to be held on April 27 in Warangal, marks a significant milestone in the party's journey and is expected to witness a grand congregation of supporters and party cadre from across Telangana.
On Sunday, a special youth wing meeting was organized at the BRS party office in Gadwal district to ...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
